00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 
00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00034   * @{
00035   */
00036 
00037 /** @addtogroup ADC_Examples ADC

00042   * @{
00043   */
00044 
00045 
00046 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 void PDMA_Configuration(void);
00048 void ADC_Configuration(void);
00049 void TM_Configuration(void);
00050 
00051 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00053   * @brief  Main program.
00054   * @retval None
00055   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00056 int main(void)
00057 {
00058   PDMA_Configuration();
00059 
00060   ADC_Configuration();
00061 
00062   TM_Configuration();
00063 
00064   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00065      The trigger source must be kept inactive before ADC enable. Since the "TM_TimeBaseInit()" will
00066      generate an Update Event via the MTO pin, you shall configure the ADC trigger source after
00067      "TM_Configuration()" when the ADC trigger source is MTO.
00068   */
00069   /* Set TM MTO as ADC trigger source                                                                       */
00070   ADC_RegularTrigConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, HTCFG_ADC_TRIG_TM);
00071 
00072   ADC_Cmd(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, ENABLE);
00073 
00074   /* Enable TM which will trigger ADC start of conversion periodically                                      */
00075   TM_Cmd(HTCFG_LED_TM_PORT, ENABLE);
00076 
00077   while (1)
00078   {
00079   }
00080 }
00081 
00082 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00083   * @brief  PDMA configuration.
00084   * @retval None
00085   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00086 void PDMA_Configuration(void)
00087 {
00088   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00089     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00090     CKCUClock.Bit.PDMA = 1;
00091     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00092   }
00093 
00094   { /* Configure PDMA channel to move ADC result from ADC->DR[0] to TM CHnCCR                               */
00095 
00096     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00097        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00098        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00099     */
00100     PDMACH_InitTypeDef PDMACH_InitStructure;
00101 
00102     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_SrcAddr = (u32)&HTCFG_ADC_PORT->DR[0];
00103     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr = (u32)((&HTCFG_LED_TM_PORT->CH0CCR) + HTCFG_LED_TM_CHN);
00104     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkCnt = 1;
00105     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkLen = 1;
00106     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DataSize = WIDTH_32BIT;
00107     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_Priority = VH_PRIO;
00108     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_AdrMod = SRC_ADR_FIX | DST_ADR_FIX | AUTO_RELOAD;
00109     PDMA_Config(HTCFG_DMA_PORT, &PDMACH_InitStructure);
00110     PDMA_EnaCmd(HTCFG_DMA_PORT, ENABLE);
00111   }
00112 }
00113 
00114 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00115   * @brief  ADC configuration.
00116   * @retval None
00117   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00118 void ADC_Configuration(void)
00119 {
00120   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00121     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00122     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00123     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_ADC_IPN = 1;
00124     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00125   }
00126 
00127   /* Configure AFIO mode as ADC function                                                                    */
00128   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_VR_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_VR_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_VR_AFIO_MODE);
00129 
00130   { /* ADC related settings                                                                                 */
00131     /* CK_ADC frequency is set to (CK_AHB / 64)                                                             */
00132     CKCU_SetADCnPrescaler(HTCFG_ADC_CKCU_ADCPRE, CKCU_ADCPRE_DIV64);
00133 
00134     /* One Shot mode, sequence length = 1                                                                   */
00135     ADC_RegularGroupConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, ONE_SHOT_MODE, 1, 0);
00136 
00137     /* ADC conversion time = (Sampling time + Latency) / CK_ADC = (1.5 + ADST + 12.5) / CK_ADC              */
00138     /* Set ADST = 0, sampling time = 1.5 + ADST                                                             */
00139     #if (LIBCFG_ADC_SAMPLE_TIME_BY_CH)
00140       // The sampling time is set by the last parameter of the function "ADC_RegularChannelConfig()".
00141     #else
00142     ADC_SamplingTimeConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, 0);
00143     #endif
00144 
00145     /* Set ADC conversion sequence as channel n                                                             */
00146     ADC_RegularChannelConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, HTCFG_VR_ADC_CH, 0, 0);
00147 
00148     #if 0
00149     /* Set TM MTO as ADC trigger source                                                                     */
00150     ADC_RegularTrigConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, HTCFG_ADC_TRIG_TM);
00151     #endif
00152   }
00153 
00154   /* Issue ADC DMA request when cycle end of conversion occur                                               */
00155   ADC_PDMAConfig(HTCFG_ADC_PORT, ADC_PDMA_REGULAR_CYCLE, ENABLE);
00156 }
00157 
00158 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00159   * @brief  TM configuration.
00160   * @retval None
00161   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00162 void TM_Configuration(void)
00163 {
00164   /* Configure timer channel n as PWM output mode used to represent potentiometer's level                   */
00165 
00166   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00167     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00168     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00169     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_LED_TM_IPN = 1;
00170     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00171   }
00172 
00173   /* Configure LED AFIO mode as timer function                                                              */
00174   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_LED_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_LED_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_LED_AFIO_FUN);
00175 
00176   { /* Time base configuration                                                                              */
00177 
00178     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00179        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00180        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00181     */
00182     TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef TimeBaseInit;
00183 
00184     TimeBaseInit.Prescaler = 100 - 1;
00185     TimeBaseInit.CounterReload = 4096 - 1;
00186     TimeBaseInit.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00187     TimeBaseInit.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00188     TimeBaseInit.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00189     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00190        "PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE" writes the TM EVRG UEV1G bit and generates a Update Event via
00191        the MTO pin (MTO default is in Reset mode).
00192     */
00193     TM_TimeBaseInit(HTCFG_LED_TM_PORT, &TimeBaseInit);
00194   }
00195 
00196   { /* Channel n output configuration                                                                       */
00197 
00198     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00199        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00200        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00201     */
00202     TM_OutputInitTypeDef OutInit;
00203     OutInit.Channel = HTCFG_LED_TM_CH;
00204     OutInit.OutputMode = TM_OM_PWM2;
00205     OutInit.Control = TM_CHCTL_ENABLE;
00206     OutInit.ControlN = TM_CHCTL_DISABLE;
00207     OutInit.Polarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00208     OutInit.PolarityN = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00209     OutInit.IdleState = MCTM_OIS_LOW;
00210     OutInit.IdleStateN = MCTM_OIS_HIGH;
00211     OutInit.Compare = 0;
00212     OutInit.AsymmetricCompare = 0;
00213     TM_OutputInit(HTCFG_LED_TM_PORT, &OutInit);
00214 
00215     #if (IS_IPN_MCTM(HTCFG_LED_TM_IPN))
00216     /* MCTM Channel Main Output Enable                                                                      */
00217     MCTM_CHMOECmd(HTCFG_LED_TM_PORT, ENABLE);
00218     #endif
00219   }
00220 
00221   /* Update event 1 is used as MTO trigger output.                                                          */
00222   TM_MMSELConfig(HTCFG_LED_TM_PORT, TM_MMSEL_UPDATE);
00223 }
00224 
00225 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00226 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00227   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00228   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00229   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00230   * @retval None
00231   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00232 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00233 {
00234   /*
00235      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00236      Debug message can be added here.
00237      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00238   */
00239 
00240   while (1)
00241   {
00242   }
00243 }
00244 #endif
